readable.title: 3227140905_1d7e30e4c4
readable.content: A man and are playing cards but the man has thrown some cards in the air A man throws cards as he and the woman are sitting and playing cards . A woman screams as a man throws a deck of cards . A young man and woman sit at a small table amidst flying playing cards . Man and woman at glass table , man flinging playing cards as woman reacts .
